title: Quantum RTSC Protocol: Reproducible Room-Temperature Superconductivity Pipeline
description: Open-source protocol for room-temperature superconductivity in hydrogen-intercalated graphene/h-BN heterostructures. Includes canonical JSON schema, reproducible demo artifacts, CI validation, and analysis tools implementing the multi-channel Allen–Dynes equation.
notes: This release (v1.0.0) includes schema-backed outputs, reproducible demo artifacts, CI validation, and developer Makefile targets.
